Topic.Title: **New Quest Game Announcement : You Are A Priest! (Now with link to game)**

Posts.EditableText:
(http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/8babqykrmkk_q6oedifuzw/you-are-a-priest click here)
My first game has just published - **YOU ARE A PRIEST** - a simulation game of training to be a Catholic Priest.
Honestly, just try it. Even if you think it's a bit sad.
Part 2 coming soon.............
Thanks for looking

Posts.EditableText: Hey little sis! I really enjoyed it! Reminded me of these fantasy adventure books I had as a kid where you made a choice, and then turned to a page based on your choice. Only without the grisly death when you made the wrong choice. Keep going! I want to know what happens next.
